about_the_game:
Welcome to Crazy Corn:

Crazy Corn is an addictive clicker game where your clicking skills can lead you to unimaginable riches! Improve your level, automate your income and get new inventory items for the time you spend in the game.
Key Features:
Crazy Corn uses a unique leveling mechanic. Taps are used as currency for leveling up, but that's not all. For greater value of items and greater demand for them, items obtained during the time spent in the game are also used in leveling up. The higher the level, the more taps and items you will need to increase the level.


Easy to get started: just click to start your journey to wealth.
Automation: As you level up, Automation of Taps opens.
Level progression: Unlock and explore 10 levels, with each new level unlocking new items, surprises and bonuses.

Get your Crazy Corn every 3 hours!
